website_summaries.verdict: Extremely packable and soft as your favorite T-shirt, these sheets are great for travel use in a portable crib.
pros: Comfortable like your favorite warm, soft T-shirt
Doesn't pull up the mattress edges
Fits up to a 3" thick mattress
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: A bit thin, but they will pack easily with your portable crib

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Guava Family Lotus playpen/crib
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Guava Family Lotus crib/playpen. I read a review that said this fits it and it does. It’s a lot cheaper than the sheet specifically made for it. It fits perfectly. There is no problems putting in on or taking it off. It’s very soft and easy to clean. My only mistake was having my daughter eat apples on it while in the playpen. I didn’t know that apples stain.
customer_reviews.author: laverne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice snug fit on my Dream On Me 3 Playard Mattress, the pockets are deep, the sheet is thin but as other reviews, it's breathable for the infants safety. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice pack n play mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an add on item when I purchased the Millard mattress for the Graco pack-n-play. Price is very low but washed up fine and fits the 3” thick mattress snugly. Corners did not pull up when grand daughter slept on it. Will purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: vpage

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sleeps in a pack and play 3 nights a week while her father and I work. AT GRANDMAS...relax, she's safe... Anyway, the padded bottom kept folding over itself and making lumps on the pad leading to one fussy babe. We bought this and not only is baby so eternally grateful but grandma too! She has been sleeping SO much smoother through the night now that we have this and it fit like a charm! It does add an extra inch or so to the bottom of the pack and play but our little love isn't doing any hardcore parkour yet so we're solid.
customer_reviews.author: Here's the Truth

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: They fit the thin pack n play mattress insert I've got perfectly. No issues so far. Update: Still no issues even after washing. Also, to clarify, I have not used them on the pack n play mat alone. I use the dream on me foam "mattress" and they fit that perfectly. My pack n play is also used as a crib. I've purchased at least one of every color and will purchase more as I need to.
customer_reviews.author: K Jones

customer_reviews.title: Finally found one that fits!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a sheet that fits my pack n play! I have a Graco Newborn 2 Toddler Pack n Play and originally bought a set of sheets by Graco so I assumed they would fit. I got them at my baby shower, washed them and put them away. When the time came, I was so confused because they were really baggy and didn't fit at all. This sheet is just like a normal fitted sheet with elastic and fits the pack n play mattress perfectly. It's not the softest sheet in the world but I just needed something inexpensive for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: CaitM

customer_reviews.title: The BEST sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are by far the best you can buy. I run a home child care and we have to be very careful on which sheets to use because they can not have any slipping and if the corners are tugged they have to stay in place. These do exactly that! They are very good sheets and the safest that I have come by so far. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MNMommy

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: So this sheet barely fit on my portable crib mattress (24" x 37.5" x 2") before I washed it. After a trip through the dryer it was laughably small. It does however fit my changing table pad perfectly now, so I am keeping it as a changing pad cover. Personally I wouldn't buy this product again and wouldn't recommend it unless you are purchasing it for a bassinet. Its a shame, the construction and fabric seem ok if it weren't for the sizing problem.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack N Play sheets for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Great sheet for an amazing price! Bought several of these to use with our Graco Pack N Play. PROS: Fit nice and snug on our Pack N Play, it needs to stretch to cover it, but it didnt bother me at all Soft, jersey material (like a t shirt) is softer than the Graco sheet we had before Amazing price! I can buy 2 of these for what most other playard sheets cost Good color selection (we have the light green, light blue, grey and mint) CONS: I really can't think of any issues we have had with these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and snug jersey fitted mini crib sheet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sheets to cover the mattress that comes with the Delta Children Bennington mini crib. They were a surprisingly great fit! I purchased the ivory and the gray. The ivory had a little more give and was easier to put on the mattress. The gray fits a little more snugly for whatever reason, and slightly rounds the corners of the mattress. The snug fit doesn't really bother me, as I assume the sheets will loosen slightly as my baby lays and moves around a bit in the crib. I am very happy with these Jersey sheets and I think they're a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Helbling

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, soft
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our daycare, so we've purchased a couple of dozen of them. I've had to re-sew a seam on four of them and fix one elastic that all came poorly done. (For the price, it's worth the repairs.) Except for the repairs, they have all held up after several months of daily washing and bleaching. The blue color does fade to white, but there are no holes and they are still soft and easy to use. They are the perfect size for our compact crib mattresses, without excess fabric (which would be a safe-sleep violation.) We will purchase more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Quigley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.iv put it through its first wash and has help up. I was a little surprised because of the stitching. It doesn’t look the best but was expecting it from looking at the reviews. It’s good for the value though. Will continue to wash on delicate setting to be safe. Its a good temporary up until I can get something of better quality. I will update if it last longer then expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute but doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: The sheet is very soft and looks to be good quality, however I was under the impression that this would fit my Graco Travel Crib (pack n play) and it's much too large. I'm able to tuck the sheet under the pad in order to use it but it should fit better than that. For that reason I'm giving this 4 stars. The sheet itself is cute and soft. If it wasn't for the fact that it doesn't fit I would've given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and affordable sheets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to go on my Dream on Me Pack'n'play mattress and they fit perfectly. I seriously can't believe how inexpensive they were, given the quality and durability. They're very soft and snuggley. After loving the grey color, I purchased another set in baby blue. Both sets have held up beautifully through 2 months of regular washing. If for some reason I end up needing more sheets, I won't think of buying anything else but these!
customer_reviews.author: bashopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for Babyletto-
customer_reviews.text: Great 100% cotton fitted sheet for the Babyletto Pure Coro mini crib mattress. I was looking for a gold accented colored sheet that was cotton and this color matched perfectly. Its soft and fits the mattress perfectly. I prewashed it on Perm Press setting and cold water and it held up great, did not rip or tear. We rely heavily on reviews for our Amazon purchases so if this was helpful for you, mark 'Helpful'. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Sheets in pkg not the same
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the set of (2) sheets. When order arrived both sheets have "American Baby" label, however, one sheet states made in Pakistan and is much better quality than the other (which shows made in China). The sheet from Pakistan has a wider elastic band at hem...definitely higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy one that's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for really. Got it, washed it and put it on the mattress and it was to small. It bends the mattress and lifts the sides. I did look at the measurements of it before I bought it and it was suppose to be the right size for the mattress that I have. But, it's just to small. The material is a little harsh. It's not very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Leandra Panzino

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really sure how to rate this on all categories but I threw it out. I purchased this with a playpen mattress (as it came up As an option to purchase then together) and to my complete surprise it didn’t even come close to fitting!!!! I didn’t want to waste my time with going through a return so I just threw it in the garbage. A big waste
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are sturdy and hold up well in the wash. The color in the photo is accurate to reality. These sheets are incredibly soft and hold up well with no shrinkage or pilling in cold wash and low heat dry. They are not "hot" like some microfiber sheets are. I am very happy with my purchase and would purchase these sheets all over again (and probably will soon in a different color)! I totally recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Best sheet for the best price
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this sheet. It is perfect for our mini crib and especially with its price tag. Mini crib sheets, even though they are smaller are usually more expensive unfortunately but this sheet was under $10 and the jersey knit feel is terrific. My daughter loves it. My daughter does tend to leak through her daughter though so I do have to wash it fairly often and noticed the corner has started to get a small hole after about a months use
customer_reviews.author: Keely Ann Booth

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Soft!
customer_reviews.text: This fit PERFECTLY on our mini crib mattress and was so so so super soft. It is cute and easy to wash which was so necessary when we had night time blow outs or if baby leaked through the diaper. The only thing I’d like to mention is that it’s not the most opaque sheet. we had a solid colored mattress but if it had had a pattern it would have been lightly visible through the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Great price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these sheets almost a year...no fading, no piling, perfect fit. 100% recommend!! I have bought other sheets over double the cost of these and have a been disappointed because I compare everything to these. They also make changing pad covers which I own multiple of with the same quality and durablikity.
customer_reviews.author: effie

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive & good quality!
customer_reviews.text: What a great find! It really is soft and pretty good quality for how much you pay. Fits my joovy pack n play perfectly and I love that it’s not too thick. The stitching and quality of the sheet seems pretty good so I think this will last for a good amount of time. I washed it as soon as I got it and not one thread got loose. It’s a soft light weight sheet. Perfect for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jk_817

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute sheets!! They are very soft. They’re definitely on the thinner side. (I can see the pattern of the mattress through the white sheets). But it’s not a deal breaker. I love the variety of patterns. I got two sets because inevitably one gets dirty and I wanted a spare while I washed the other.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Great for Graco Pack n Play!
customer_reviews.text: Liked: Fits my Graco Pack n Play perfectly! The blue is a pretty color and seems like durable material. Easy to clean and is soft. Dislike: Nothing! We purchased a quilted mattress pad to go with it to add to the comfort of the plastic Graco mattress. Verdict: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: KTAQC

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, durable, colorful
customer_reviews.text: We've used these with both our kids and they don't disappoint. A great sheet at a great price, lots of colorful patterns to choose from, and have had no problems getting out stains in the wash. They hold up well over time and are a reliable go to whenever you need to order another set from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: The Huntington Book Depository

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheet that fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I like this sheet it is soft and fits our portable play yard/crib mattress perfectly and snugly. It's softer and a better fit than our other sheet so I prefer to use this one when it is clean. Cleaning is easy, just toss it in the machine with the other baby stuff and baby detergent.
customer_reviews.author: O. D. Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: perfect crib sheet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect crib sheet. I ordered the pink whale and the color was exactly what I had hoped for. The texture is incredibly soft and it is a perfect fit for our mini-sized mattress. It's a wonderful knit, that is not too thin, but not so thick that it is too warm. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe C

customer_reviews.title: Meant for mini mattresses. Good quality material.
customer_reviews.text: I must have misread the discription and missed the "mini" part. I did manage to squeeze it over the crib mattress I bought for my dog to sleep on with a little bit of curling at the edges. The material is nice and soft. It took the stretching I gave it quite well. It may be too thin for some people's liking, but I think it is a good sheet for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli B.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: When i first got them they seemed fine. They are soft & fit the pack 'n play mattress perfectly. The first time my son slept on them they balled up quite a bit. They haven't done that since, but they stain very easily & the color fades where he sleeps. I still use them, but I will throw them away when he outgrows the pack 'n play.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: So so soft. It fit my Graco pack n play perfectly. I have an added pad underneath and it still fits. It's very stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Catcity

customer_reviews.title: They Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues getting my son to sleep in his pack n play because the mattress is so loud when he would move around on it. These sheets helped a lot because it made it less noisy and it was a lot softer. I definitely recommend these. They also stay put really well and don’t come off of the mattress when he moves.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus D.

customer_reviews.title: This is actually better than I thought it was going to be
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome sheet. I thought it was going to be super cheap and wear down fast but I've had it for a while now with multiple washes, my baby sleeps in this all the time, the stretch is still there! I highly recommend this sheet and the price value is great!
customer_reviews.author: Renee LeQuesne

customer_reviews.title: SO comfy
customer_reviews.text: So soft and comfy, easily stretchable over my babies pack n play mattress (fits regular pack n play NOT the tiny mini-mini version called travelite). Lightweight and washes and dries quality and quickly! Bought the brownish feathers and it's super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this sheet is too small for our Graco Pack n Play. It took a lot of adjusting to get it on the mattress, and I had to press down because the mattress wanted to naturally fold. It might have been my fault for putting it in the dryer. Will hang dry in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: shrinks!
customer_reviews.text: This shrinks when you put it in the dryer. This is a baby item and will be washed and dried multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Louise PDX Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sheets back in Dec. 2012 when when my son was born for $5.99, and was not happy with the quality. They quickly faded, worn so much you could see through them, barely covered the thin 2" mattress we had at the time, and developed holes a few months after purchasing. We then purchased Luvable Friends sheets for the 3" Dream on Me portable crib mattress, when my daughter was born in 2014 on Amazon for $5.99, that held up very well. We still have these sheets, but use them as last resort backups.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: So Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a portable crib we have for my granddaughter who we watch twice week. I've only had this long enough to wash it once so I can't address is durability, but it laundered nicely. The fabric is so soft which I was looking for. And I like the fit - just snug enough. May order another.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fits babyletto mini crib
customer_reviews.text: Really love these crib sheets for our babyletto mini crib! They just barely fit but I have a thick water protector underneath and they stretch to fit. Even after washing on hot they came out OK and fitting just fine! Will buy again. - best price!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Simple Baby Life

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for price
customer_reviews.text: We bought these sheets for the great price & you get what you pay for. They're definitely durable and easy to clean. I would buy again. My only complaint is that I wish they were a *little* bit thicker of a material, but adding a mattress pad to the mini-crib or pack n play mattress solves that issue easily. Actually just added some to my registry for baby #2.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Dream on Me travel crib well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the dream on me travel crib. Fits well. Makes the mattress fold if the mattress isn’t buckled in to the frame but stretches out perfectly. True to color in the picture and soft enough for baby to sleep on. Overall happy!
customer_reviews.author: CasRy

customer_reviews.title: flaw in manufacturing and quality control process apparently
customer_reviews.text: The material is not as soft as I thought it would be and apparently there is no quality control process to ensure the sheet was sewn properly. I received the product yesterday and proceeded to wash the sheet on delicate cycle using sensitive baby detergent. I then put the sheet on the mattress and discovered one of the four corner seams is backwards. If I put the sheet on with three seams inside toward the mattress, one seam is backward making it look like I have the sheet inside out. Since I have already washed the product, I can't send it back. I won't buy this product again. Very poor manufacturing processes and the jersey material is not that soft.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This sheet does not fit mini/portable crib mattresses. It popped up as a recommended product, I assumed it would fit and I was completely wrong. Do not waste your money if you are purchasing the DOM portable crib.
customer_reviews.author: shopper61

customer_reviews.title: Hasn’t faded after 5 washes
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mini crib sheet for the price. It’s a little scratchy, but after washed it feels a lot better. It seems to hold its shape & color too after many washes. It hasn’t faded yet or any of that, and I’ve washed it probably 5 times. Quality overall seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Martine

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit the mattress perfectly and does the job. I ordered the mint color to match our play yard and it matches perfectly! It is slightly see through (i can see the cloud print on the mattress underneath) but i didnt want a thick sheet that could over heat my baby.
customer_reviews.author: mellisa c.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is a great value, super soft and beautiful mint color. The first sheet I received had an issue with it and Amazon instantly sent a replacement. They made it so easy for me to replace. I am so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: blueyes087

customer_reviews.title: soft nice crib sheet
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I bought this for the pack and play as I have several grandchildren. When the come to visit the take there nap in the pack and play. These sheets wash so well and are very soft. I would buy these again in a second!

customer_reviews.title: Interferes with velcro under mattress.
customer_reviews.text: The sheet fits the dimensions of the Pack'n Play mattress, but covers the velcro patches needed to keep the mattress in place. I had to cut holes in each corner of the sheet, and since I don't sew, the holes are ripping bigger with use.
customer_reviews.author: teachercampbell

customer_reviews.title: Watch the threading
customer_reviews.text: These have been great sheets, but the threading stretches when you wash it. I have to cut it back after each wash because I have the fear of my baby getting tangled in it, even though it's just the reinforcement seam underneath the sheet. The regular seams have held up good though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pack and Play mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for pack and play mattress as we were going on vacation, perfect fit, nice and soft, son loves it and slept on it no problems, easy to clean, even after a few accidents it wasn't stained, still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Cortese

customer_reviews.title: love the quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great play yard sheets. A little tight and made for a deeper mattress which of course play yards don't have. But overall I love the softness, quality and they lauder perfectly. I fully recommend
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Wafer thin
customer_reviews.text: This fits on the 3" play yard mattress just fine but it's so thin that we had to layer another blanket between to get any sort of cushion. I would not recommend this if you plan to use it for constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to cover our " Dream On Me Foam Pack and Play Mattress " for our son's pack and play. It fit perfectly. On top of being super cute, it's affordable. It was a little thin, but we don't really need a thicker one for the purposes were using it for. Overall, pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: leslie c.

customer_reviews.title: Quality has significantly improved
customer_reviews.text: I have these fitted sheets in the gray stars and moons pattern for my twins’ mini cribs. I have been pleased with the sheets since I first bought them summer 2019. They are a cute pattern, wash well, and fit the 3” mattresses. We needed one more so I ordered another. The newest sheet is even better! It feels like better quality with more sturdy hemming around the elastic and fits even better than the ones I bought earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Memden

customer_reviews.title: Elastic all the way around
customer_reviews.text: Had the feel of a nice jersey knit. Fits an upgraded 3 inch portable crib mattress well. The elastic runs all the way around the sheet and would probably be too snug for a thin one inch pack n play mattress and might cause the mattress to roll. This was adequate for what we needed, and it felt soft to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: JaneDoe911

customer_reviews.title: so soft and so affordable
customer_reviews.text: these are so soft and comfortable. We purchased like 10 in assorted colors for our different pack-n-plays and additional mattresses we purchased for pack-n-play. These sheets fit both items well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolee

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous if it slips off mattress
customer_reviews.text: This sheet did not fit the 3” dream on me mattress. It barely covered the sides. This would not be safe for baby if the sheet slipped off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the 3 inch thick pack and play mattress I purchased. Stretches well over the mattress. Lays nice and flat when the baby is sleeping and does not bunch up. Seemed a little thin but I also use the mattress pad that was recommended with the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: annecarroll

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits the dream on me mattress for a pack and play perfect even over the American baby mattress protector. It soft and comfy..good color not dull or faded. Only thing was the stitching seems poor..kinda cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Loving Mama

customer_reviews.title: No Wrinkles and Nice Color After Wash-Super Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying these sheets since they were so cheap to buy. So glad I bought these sheets. They washed out nicely and didn’t wrinkle. They fit the small crib mattress perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: GiGiBlogger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our travel pack and play
customer_reviews.text: We are using our travel pack and play/mini crib as bassinet for our little one. These sheets worked great and fit the mattress well! I ordered in blue and green and was happy with the purchase. Basic but that's all we needed!
customer_reviews.author: L. Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Color is beautiful!...Until you put it on.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is soft and just fit my mini crib mattress. I ordered the mint and the pink. The colors were really beautiful, I was in love with the mint! Unfortunately, the fabric is so thin when I stretched it over the mattress (which was a perfect fit seam to seam) the color lightened significantly because you could see the mattress pad beneath it. That to me was a bit disappointing but given the price, I suppose I can't make to much of a stink about it. Arrived on time and packaged perfectly. Would probably order again for the value, just really wish they were a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Wicked.Whimsy

customer_reviews.title: I bought more already
customer_reviews.text: Love the price and quality. Jersey cotton fits our very, very thick crib and pack and play mattresses so well. This brand totally delivered! Already purchasing backups for leak through nights.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 4” mattress
customer_reviews.text: The sheet is a pretty color and soft, but it’s too small for anything larger than a 3” thick mattress. We have a 4” mini crib mattress and this sheet is barely gripping it. I would recommending checking the thickness of your mattress before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Fits our Pack N Play mattress perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Fits our Pack N Play mattress perfectly. Very cute, loooove the soft pink little stars. It's been a challenge to find baby girl items that arent a hideous pink. Baby is going to be very comfy on these sheets. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Covey

customer_reviews.title: Need to express in your ad NOT FOR NORMAL SIZE CRIB
customer_reviews.text: Sheets are sheets, was ok but I did not realize mini meant for bassinet. I thought that was part of the name. Need to express NOT FOR NORMAL SIZE CRIB. Otherwise why are you calling them crib sheets. It's not for a crib.
customer_reviews.author: k.m.r.j. Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Read the size!
customer_reviews.text: My mistake, I looked at this product many times for days before buying and was shocked when I got them. Somehow I missed that it was for a tiny mattress. I put 4 star instead of 5 because of how easy it was to overlook the miniature size. I didn't rate it less than 4 because it seemed to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It isntreally soft which isnt a big deal to me, its also thin. Other than that it is worth what you pay, it fits well on the mattress, and have had no issue in the months i have used it.
customer_reviews.author: Xavia B.

customer_reviews.title: Thin and runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to go on a Cosco Playard mattress and found that it runs a bit small. It fits on the mattress but the seems pull on to the top of the mattress because it is a little small. It is also thinner than I thought it would be - it's ok because my baby runs very warm but if you are looking for a warm sheet this is not the one. But for the price it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Cpiper

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this!
customer_reviews.text: I searched FOREVER to find a fitted sheet that would fit on our Chicco Lullago bassinet and was SO glad I came across this one on Amazon. It fits very well on the bassinet but is really thin. I recommend purchasing a waterproof pad/liner to place under the fitted sheet just in case you have an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren N

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit great with mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: Great sheet because it’s pretty soft. However, it doesn’t fit my pattered with the mattress pad very well. The lingers sides end up not covering the mattress completely.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: but it ended up being softer and better fitting than the much more expensive Carousel mini sheets
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a back up sheet for my minicrib, but it ended up being softer and better fitting than the much more expensive Carousel mini sheets. I just wish there were more color/pattern options!
customer_reviews.author: Bliss Hartnett

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo soft! It’s hard to find mini crib sheets so I was very happy with these! It would be awesome to see these come out in some cute prints! 💕
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great pattern and price!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the pattern and how soft the fabric stayed even after washing and drying. It fit perfectly on the Dream on Me Sunset 3” mattress I ordered for my pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ver

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: Its really soft and a great material! I love this mattress cover its definitely my favorite one I've bought so far definitely going to buy more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and soft. Fits the travel playpens. Havent try it on a regular playpen which tend to be a bit bigger than the travel one. Love the material.
customer_reviews.author: God.loves.you!-jeki

customer_reviews.title: Soft and nice!
customer_reviews.text: I just needed something for the time that my grandson comes home( a few days), I can't tell if the quality is good for longer use, I washed it once and still the same color and size, it is nice and it fits right on the small crib.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelapaz

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: In reading the bold writing for the description on these, I was expecting crib size sheets. They are not for standard cribs. These appear to be sheets for a bassinet or cradle. They were sewn very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi Fulte

customer_reviews.title: Super soft but a little too thin for mattresses with patterns
customer_reviews.text: It’s super soft, fits perfectly on the Matress that goes into the Graco Pack n’ Play, and a great product at this price point. However, the fabric is kind of thin. We could see the prints on the mattress and underneath the crib sheet. This is the reason we are returning it, and looking for something that have a higher thread count. It wouldn’t matter so much if you had a mini-crib mattress that doesn’t have patterns on it, but if you do, it’s a little bothersome if home aesthetic is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: gives that extra sofness
customer_reviews.text: This little mattress is the perfect size for our pack and play! Gives the baby that extra softness when he sleeps. I love how it folds up and comes with it's own carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: tracy crooks

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress for different uses
customer_reviews.text: Suitable replacement for a crib before baby starts rolling around and for space. Allows baby to be literally right by your side in a pack and play and provides extra cushion. Now we use it as a sleep mat for the toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Play mat fitted sheet. Fits fine!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a store model pack and play for our first daughter, because I needed it to complete the nursery. But with it being on the floor it was a bit dusty and I'm sure many people had touched it. So we washed it, but just to be safe, I purchased this. It fits perfecftly on the play mat and the color was correct.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Pack and play sheet
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pack and play sheet. I thought it was a regular crib sheet when I bought, but I guess that’s my bad for not understanding What the description. It was a happy accident bc I needed a pack and play sheet anyways. Very soft jersey cotton breathable feel.
customer_reviews.author: GA Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: This is a standard run of the mill sheet. It is a little think though, I can see the design of the mattress cover clearly through the sheet. Good as a backup sheet while doing laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: My only regret is I didn't buy more.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the Dream On Me 3" Foam Playard Mattress because my daughter sleeps in a Pack 'N Play instead of a crib. I was worried that these sheets wouldn't fit correctly but they fit perfectly and they're also extremely soft. The pattern is really cute too. My only regret is I didn't buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Too Small after washing.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. They are incredibly soft but as soon as you wash them they won’t fit the pack and play mattress anymore. The sheet is so tight that it causes the mattress to bow up and not lay down flat. I was able to use them once!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and great value - I actually bought this to line my son's wicker basket, but I would purchase these for a mini crib if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not for mattress 24x37 or bigger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my pack and play mattress that measures 24x37. It was too small! The mattress wouldn’t lay flat after putting this on.
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pack n play!
customer_reviews.text: SO SOFT! These sheets are perfect for traveling and using on a pack n play mattress. I have since purchased a few more because we love them so much. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the pack and play that we purchased for our daughter for our new grandson. Fits the Graco pack and play perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lee Watson

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a mini-playpen and I was worried about covering the cushion. This works great! I wasn't sure it was the right size, but it fits!
customer_reviews.author: kathen

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening I noticed a hole on the sheet. It’s not on the seam so I can’t even repair it. Very disappointing. It’s soft but very thin you can see through it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Fits 3" dream on me mattress PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: It fits the 3" dream on me mattress perfectly. I would say there is about 1.5" to 2" on the bottom side of the mattress but still very snug. Fits like our sheets fit. I put a waterproof sheet under it for easier clean up but also a little for comfort/warmth. If you have the 3" dream on me mattress, give it a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tierra Marbray

customer_reviews.title: Love this, already ordered more!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the one that fits my Graco pack n play!! The material is soft and thick and looks great. I love that it’s actually elastic like a typical sheet. The Graco sheet I got wasn’t elastic, wasn’t soft, and didn’t fit it’s own product. American baby is definitely the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small but soft
customer_reviews.text: The sheet is nice and soft, wash’s well. The only downfall is it seems to run a bit small and my mattress or pad wants to buckle. If only an inch or two longer.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: This item goes perfectly with the Graco play and go, and turns it into a more complete and longer term bed for baby. Excellent item.
customer_reviews.author: AMO

customer_reviews.title: Not for Graco travel lite
customer_reviews.text: Cute sheet, does not fit Graco travel lite crib. I have to tuck it in all around to remove any wrinkles. Good quality for price. May see if it will fit anything else I have and order something different.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Kinda lose for mini crib mattress,  fit 2 inch mini mattress petfectly
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, soft and kept all color even after 3 washes , fit the mini crib mattress a little big but fit the 2 inch mini mattress perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: we purchased this sheet for our trip to florida. its so soft & lightweight. we didnt want our little man to get too warm sleeping & this did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Haley P.

customer_reviews.title: Buying more
customer_reviews.text: Best sheets ever!!! We bought a mini crib and have the hardest time finding sheets that fit. My baby spits up tons and it never stains!! We’ve bought a couple of them and the quality didn’t change. They are so soft and the colors have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Hansen

product_meta.title: American Baby Company 100% Natural Cotton Value Jersey Knit Fitted Portable/Mini-Crib Sheet, Blue, Soft Breathable, for Boys and Girls, Pack of 1
product_meta.description: Color:Blue| Size:Pack of 1| Style:Portable/MiniOur 100% Cotton value jersey knit fitted mini crib sheet provides comfort for the next generation. Fits standard 24" x 38" mini crib mattresses and can fit up to 3" thick mattresses; Deep pockets with elastic all around provide a snug and secure fit for baby's comfort. Machine washable cold with gentle cycle , tumble dry low for best results.
feature_bullets: 100% Jersey Cotton. Measures 24 inches x 38 inches
SOFT. Our Value Jersey portable mini sheets offer a warm, tee shirt like feel for exceptional comfort
SELECTION. Available in a variety of colors to match any style
QUALITY. Snug fit up to 3" thick mattress and elastic all around. Machine washable and dryable
VALUE. Quality and style at a great price

specifications.Material free: BPA Free, Phthalate Free, Latex Free
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,023 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
